description: Oklahoma is one of the most politically conservative states in the nation and it’s also home to one of the […]
contentencoded:
Oklahoma is one of the most politically conservative states in the nation and it’s also home to one of the most successful publicly-funded preschool programs. Can the rest of the nation look to Oklahoma as a model for universal pre-k?


Guest: Sharon Lerner, journalist whose article, “Pre-K on the Range,” appeared in the December 4, 2012 issue of The American Prospect.
